response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $1,200,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that respects both our interests. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering the product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a significant discount from its true value, providing you with an excellent return on investment. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
